comments.text:

computer nerd)

comments.text:
+Ol Mate It's not an excuse, it's the truth.

And I am an Asian-American because I was born in New York, not just Asian.

I hear shit like "sorry, but I'm not into Asian guys" or "white or Spanish 
guys only."

I've done what I could and I've had rejections that ended in racist 
comments, like what happened with Tony over here. And there's times when I 
was confronted by their hulking boyfriends or overprotective racist parents.

But I do go to the gym and I go to heavy metal and goth shows.
comments.author: Chris Han Young

comments.text:
Being Asian is not an excuse for being able to meet women. Stop blaming 
both your ethnicity and western women for your lack of success. Work on 
yourself Physically, Mentally and emotionally. Go to a gym, read books, 
watch the classics, Experience new things, Meet new people whenever you get 
an opportunity and acquire a proper experience of human nature.
comments.author: Ol Mate

comments.text:
+Ol Mate Especially not here in the United States of America.

A lot of women that I've approached prefer white or Latino men and are 
quick to turn down black men, East Asians, South Asians, or Middle

The women that do love us often tend to be morbidly obese.

comments.text:
